item.title: Java - Installation
item.description: There is always a certain confusion that arises while installing Java in the linux operating system. This is due to the vagueness behind the understanding of following questions, What is JDK and JRE? and, Are both of them the same?. Among JDK and JRE, which is needed to run java programs in the system?. The quick answer to the question is, JDK alone is sufficient and to confuse you a bit, JRE alone is also able to run the java programs :).
